title: Strengthening AI Practical Skills: MOOC Learning Persistence Management Based on Expectancy-Value Theory

context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can improve task value and academic self-efficacy by over 20% in a MOOC environment.
Learners can sustain learning activities at least three times per week and complete project assignments.
Learners can propose improved learning strategies reflecting peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
